articles.title: Sony and Tencent Have Bought Over 30% of Elden Ring Developer FromSoftware - IGN
articles.description: Sony and Tencent have increased their stake in Elden Ring developer FromSoftware, now owning 30% of the company between them.
articles.content:
Sony and Tencent have increased their stake in Elden Ring developer FromSoftware, now owning over 30% of the company between them.
